Title: Authorizes the commissioner of education to require school districts to establish a parental/guardian notification program when life threatening events occur
Summary: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of education to require school districts to establish a parental/guardian notification program when potentially life threatening events occur on school grounds, e.g., bomb threats or guns or other weapons discovered or recovered.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to notification of parents and guardians
